sources.title: Hyde Park Corner
sources.description: “Harker and Hale shine” “It’s deja vu all over again” (IMDB reviews quotes). A convoluted, seriocomic tale of an 18th  century curse and 20th  century murders adapted from Walter Hackett’s successful London stage play. Binnie Hale and Gordon Harker lead a compact cast of British stage and screen pros. IMDB rating 5.6. Produced and directed by Sinclair Hill. Released in 1935 (UK only). Complete print.

metadata.Plot: A lost film not seen since it was made.
